DOC.brief_summary: In 800 child allergic disease ( asthma , allergic rhinitis , atopic dermatitis ) investigator retrospectively cross-sectionally analyze influence/correlation diagnosis , treatment method , allergy status ( skin prick test result ) , lung function test result on/with concentration nitric oxide exhale breath .
DOC.brief_title: Fractional Exhaled Nitric Oxide ( FeNO ) Result Prediction Factors Children With Allergic Diseases
DOC.detailed_description: In 800 child allergic disease Outpatient Clinic ( asthma , allergic rhinitis , atopic dermatitis ) retrospectively cross-sectionally analyse influence/correlation diagnosis , treatment method , allergy status ( skin prick test result ) , lung function test result on/with concentration nitric oxide exhale breath .
DOC.criteria: Children asthma ( allergic ) , and/or allergic rhinitis and/or atopic dermatitis Other chronic disease Asthma exacerbation Pregnancy
